Krishna's Names.quote: I worship Govinda, the primeval Lord, who is adept in playing on His flute, with blooming eyes like lotus petals, with head decked with peacock's feather. (Brahma Samhita 5.30)

Krishna's Titles.quote: You are the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the ultimate abode, the purest, the Absolute Truth. (Bhagavad Gita 10.12)

Krishna's Identity.quote: I am the Supersoul seated in the hearts of all living entities. (Bhagavad Gita 10.20)

Krishna's Teachings.quote: Abandon all varieties of religion and just surrender unto Me. I shall deliver you from all sinful reactions. Do not fear. (Bhagavad Gita 18.66)

Krishna's Attributes.quote: I am the source of all spiritual and material worlds. Everything emanates from Me. (Bhagavad Gita 10.8)

Krishna's Powers.quote: By Me, in My unmanifested form, this entire universe is pervaded. (Bhagavad Gita 9.4)

Krishna's Leelas.quote: The Supreme Lord, Krishna, lifted Govardhan Hill with one hand, just as a child picks up a mushroom. (Bhagavata Purana 10.25.19)

Krishna's Forms.quote: Arjuna saw in that universal form unlimited mouths, unlimited eyes, unlimited wonderful visions. (Bhagavad Gita 11.10)

Krishna's Devotees.quote: The gopis, overwhelmed with love for Krishna, danced with Him in the rasa lila. (Bhagavata Purana 10.33)

Krishna's Symbols.quote: Lord Krishna, wearing a peacock-feather ornament and yellow garments, exhibited His transcendental form. (Bhagavata Purana 10.21.5)

Krishna's Philosophy.quote: Engage your mind always in thinking of Me, become My devotee, offer obeisances to Me and worship Me. (Bhagavad Gita 9.34)

Krishna's Worship.quote: If one offers Me with love and devotion a leaf, a flower, fruit or water, I will accept it. (Bhagavad Gita 9.26)

Krishna's Manifestation.quote: Whenever there is a decline in righteousness, O Arjuna, and a predominant rise of unrighteousness, at that time I manifest Myself. (Bhagavad Gita 4.7)

Krishna's Relationship.quote: I envy no one, nor am I partial to anyone. I am equal to all. But whoever renders service unto Me in devotion is a friend, is in Me, and I am also a friend to him. (Bhagavad Gita 9.29)

Names of Krishna.quote: Krishna has thousands of names - Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava, Hari, each revealing an aspect of His divine nature. (Vishnu Sahasranama)

Divine Identity.quote: I am the source of all spiritual and material worlds. Everything emanates from Me. (Bhagavad Gita 10:8)

Divine Form.quote: I showed you My supreme form of four arms, holding conch, disc, mace and lotus. (Bhagavad Gita 11:46)

Divine Incarnation.quote: Although I am unborn and My transcendental body never deteriorates, I still appear in every millennium. (Bhagavad Gita 4:6)

Divine Play.quote: The entire cosmos is My divine play (lila), yet I remain untouched by its actions. (Bhagavad Gita 9:9)

Divine Love.quote: Those who worship Me with love dwell in Me, and I dwell in them. (Bhagavad Gita 9:29)

Divine Wisdom.quote: I give the understanding by which they can come to Me. (Bhagavad Gita 10:10)

Divine Grace.quote: Fix your mind upon Me, become My devotee, worship Me, offer your homage unto Me, and you shall certainly come to Me. (Bhagavad Gita 18:65)

Divine Protection.quote: Declare it boldly, O Arjuna, My devotee never perishes. (Bhagavad Gita 9:31)

Divine Presence.quote: I am seated in everyone's heart, and from Me come remembrance, knowledge and forgetfulness. (Bhagavad Gita 15:15)

Divine Power.quote: Of all that is powerful, I am the power devoid of desire and attachment. (Bhagavad Gita 7:11)

Divine Time.quote: I am time, the destroyer of all worlds. (Bhagavad Gita 11:32)

Divine Beauty.quote: His beauty steals the heart of millions of Cupids. (Brahma Samhita 5.30)

Divine Relationships.quote: I am the friend of every living being. (Bhagavad Gita 5:29)

Divine Activities.quote: Although I have nothing to gain and am self-sufficient, I engage in prescribed duties to set an example. (Bhagavad Gita 3:22)

Divine Nature.quote: Earth, water, fire, air, ether, mind, intelligence and false ego - all together these eight constitute My separated material energies. (Bhagavad Gita 7:4)

Divine Qualities.quote: Of all creations I am the beginning and the end and also the middle. (Bhagavad Gita 10:32)

Divine Devotion.quote: Always think of Me, become My devotee, worship Me and offer your homage unto Me. (Bhagavad Gita 18:65)

Divine Manifestations.quote: Whatever is glorious, beautiful and mighty, know that to be but a spark of My splendor. (Bhagavad Gita 10:41)

Divine Leadership.quote: To establish dharma, I appear millennium after millennium. (Bhagavad Gita 4:8)

Divine Knowledge.quote: To those who are constantly devoted to serving Me with love, I give the understanding by which they can come to Me. (Bhagavad Gita 10:10)

Divine Pastimes.quote: His transcendental pastimes in Vrindavan enchant all living entities. (Brahma Samhita 5.31)

Divine Opulence.quote: I pervade all universes by a single fragment of Myself. (Bhagavad Gita 10:42)

Divine Sound.quote: Among vibrations I am the transcendental syllable Om. (Bhagavad Gita 7:8)

Divine Essence.quote: The soul can never be cut to pieces by any weapon, nor burned by fire, nor moistened by water, nor withered by the wind. (Bhagavad Gita 2:23)

Divine Justice.quote: I am equally disposed to all living entities; there is none who is My enemy or friend. (Bhagavad Gita 9:29)

Divine Path.quote: After many births and deaths, one who is actually in knowledge surrenders unto Me, knowing Me to be the cause of all causes. (Bhagavad Gita 7:19)

Divine Connection.quote: I am the source of all spiritual and material worlds. Everything emanates from Me. (Bhagavad Gita 10:8)

Divine Reality.quote: I am the Supreme Brahman, the ultimate abode, the purest, the Absolute Truth. (Bhagavad Gita 10:12)

Divine Universe.quote: The entire cosmic manifestation is working under My direction. (Bhagavad Gita 9:10)
